function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on prevention and security keywords in research studies","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases due to lack of focus on preventive measures and security protocols","Mitigation":"Encourage research studies to prioritize prevention and security keywords to develop integrated non-clinical strategies","Technologies":"Information technology for data tracking and management, government-based application platforms, e-healthcare solutions","People":"Researchers, policymakers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"High transmission capacity of COVID-19","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of COVID-19, leading to overwhelming healthcare systems and increased mortality","Mitigation":"Strategically planned patient arrivals, PPE usage, work shift scheduling, mass testing, e-healthcare, movement control orders","Technologies":"Robot-automated intensive care units, mobile clinics, e-grocery, advanced training for medical personnel","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, general population","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate bibliometric analysis of research keywords","Impact":"Risk of missing important insights and trends in contagious disease research due to incomplete or inaccurate keyword analysis","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough keyword analysis with appropriate inclusion criteria, protocol, and consideration of relevant trends","Technologies":"Bibliometric applications for keyword analysis","People":"Researchers, analysts, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations"}]}
